Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate two students using a string telephone to communicate.
The student can depict the necessary components of a string telephone, such as cups and string.
The student can show the string being taut and connecting both cups.
The student can indicate that sound travels through the string to allow communication.
The student can demonstrate how the device works over a distance by clearly drawing space between the students.
The student can illustrate the concept that the string telephone communicates using sound.
